name.description: The name of the approvals resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

approvers.description: List of approvers for the approval request

requestMetadata.description: Request metadata for the approval request.

stateChangedAt.description: Approval request state change time, time at which approval request state changed from pending to approved or rejected.

ticketId.description: Ticket ID for the approval request

connectionCreation.description: Approval required for enclave connection creation (Required or NotRequired).

connectionDeletion.description: Approval required for enclave connection deletion (Required or NotRequired).

connectionUpdate.description: Approval required for enclave connection update (Required or NotRequired).

enclaveCreation.description: Approval required for virtual enclave creation (Required or NotRequired).

enclaveDeletion.description: Approval required for virtual enclave deletion (Required or NotRequired).

endpointCreation.description: Approval required for endpoint creation (Required or NotRequired).

endpointDeletion.description: Approval required for endpoint deletion (Required or NotRequired).

endpointUpdate.description: Approval required for endpoint update (Required or NotRequired).

maintenanceMode.description: Approval required for toggling maintenance mode (Required or NotRequired).

mandatoryApprovers.description: List of mandatory approvers for the approval request

minimumApproversRequired.description: Minimum number of approvers required for the approval request

notificationOnApprovalAction.description: Notification will be sent on any action taken (Approve/Reject) on an Approval Request

notificationOnApprovalCreation.description: Notification will be sent on creation of an Approval Request

notificationOnApprovalDeletion.description: Notification will be sent on deletion of an Approval Request

serviceCatalogDeployment.description: Approval required for deploying service catalog templates (Required or NotRequired).

destination.description: Destination address. Can include multiple CIDR/IP Addresses or fqdn tags or fqdns (for community endpoint) separated by commas.

ports.description: Port. Can include multiple ports separated by commas or a range indicated by a hyphen.

protocols.description: Protocols. Options specified by Endpoint Protocol Enum.

approvalSettings.description: Approval requirements for various actions on the community's resources.

firewallSku.description: SKU of the community's Azure Firewall (Basic, Standard, Premium). Standard is the default

governedServiceList.description: List of services governed by a community.

policyOverride.description: Policy override setting for the community. Specifies whether to apply enclave-specific policies or disable policy enforcement.

destination.description: Destination address. Can include multiple CIDR/IP Addresses or fqdn tags or fqdns (for community endpoint) separated by commas.

ports.description: Port. Can include multiple ports separated by commas or a range indicated by a hyphen.

protocols.description: Protocols. Options specified by Endpoint Protocol Enum.

option.description: Governance option for this service (Allow, Deny, ExceptionOnly, or NotApplicable).

policyAction.description: Enforcement mode for policy. AuditOnly, Enforce, or None.

justification.description: Justification for entering or exiting Maintenance Mode

mode.description: Current mode of Maintenance Mode Configuration

principals.description: The user, group or service principal object affected by Maintenance Mode

ManagedServiceIdentity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

Principal.description: Principal for maintenance mode or role assignments

id.description: The object id associated with the principal

type.description: The type of the object id. We currently allow users, groups, and service principals

approvalCallbackPayload.description: Payload to be sent upon any action on approval request

approvalCallbackRoute.description: Route name for the approval callback

approvalStatus.description: Status of the approval. Uses ApprovalStatus enum.

resourceAction.description: Resource Action of the item being approved or declined.

RoleAssignmentItem.description: Role assignment item that indicates which principals should be assigned this role definition

principals.description: List of principal IDs to which to assign this role definition

TransitHubProperties.description: Describes the properties of an Transit Hub.
